summary: An elderly woman dies in a hospital in Stockholm and it turns out that she suffered from an incurable disease. Her son though refuse to believe that it was the disease that was the primary cause of her death.
cast: Peter Haber|Mikael Persbrandt|Ingvar Hirdwall|Rebecka Hemse|Måns Nathanaelson|Anna Asp|Elmira Arikan|Jonas Karlsson|Åsa Karlin|Anu Sinisalo|Peter Schildt|Mårten Svedberg|Johan Holmberg|Gunilla Backman|Amanda Renberg|Camilla Bendix|Gunilla Nyroos|Lisa Henni|Evin Ahmad|Elisabeth Nordkvist|Bengt C.W. Carlsson|Sara Huss|Niclas Gustafsson|Anna-Karin Hirdwall|Sovi Rydén|Emilie Dahlst|Anders Ljum Olsson
title: Sjukhusmorden
